item.title: Clicking Method
item.dc:creator: @3_Days_Grace 3 Days Grace
item.description:
@3_Days_Grace wrote:

so there is this item on my server, and there is some options to get 500k xp to… and for slayer, it doesn’t work… I want the 500k to slayer, on my server when I click it, it goes back to another message thing.

[code=smarty] if(c.whichxp2 == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastAction > c.actionInterval){
c.whichxp3 = 3;
c.whichxp2 = 0;
c.whichxp = 0;

			c.sendQuest("Which Skill?", 2481);
			c.sendQuest("500k to Hitpoints", 2482);
			c.sendQuest("500k to Slayer", 2483);
			c.sendQuest("Back", 2484);
			c.sendQuest("Cancel", 2485);
			c.sendQuest("", 2485);
			c.sendFrame164(2480);

}
break;[/code]

[size=24pt]What Should I do? [/size]

Read full topic
